title: How does this make sense?
body:
I had 2 wins that were an A+ and a B grade;And I got 10 LP each. 

We lost the next match but i got a S- and lost 21 LP how does this make sense?

replies.body: because those skill ratings do not affect anything to do with your mmr.  Losing more lp for a loss than you get for a win means your mmr (match making rating) is lower than the division you are in and is thus trying to place you in the correct division.  You need to win a bunch of games to bring it back up
